reason: NO_RULE - insufficient evidence or no valid constraint found
notes: No explicit normative relationship or constraint between cdm-Type and periodicityAndOffset found in the provided evidence.

meta.evidence: The following parameters for which the UE shall assume non-zero transmission power for CSI-RS resource are configured via the higher layer parameter NZP-CSI-RS-Resource, CSI-ResourceConfig and NZP-CSI-RS-ResourceSet for each CSI-RS resource configuration: - nzp-CSI-RS-Resourceld determines CSI-RS resource configuration identity. - periodicityAndOffset defines the CSI-RS periodicity and slot offset for periodic/semi-persistent CSI-RS. All the CSI-RS resources within one set are configured with the same periodicity, while the slot offset can be same or different for different CSI-RS resources. - resourceMapping defines the number of ports, CDM-type, and OFDM symbol and subcarrier occupancy of the CSI-RS resource within a slot that are given in Clause 7.4.1.5 of [4, TS 38.211]. ETSI
